package chapter1.step3;

import java.util.Scanner;
import java.text.DecimalFormat;
public class FarheheitToCentigrade {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		//DecimalFormat df=new DecimalFormat("#.00");
		//Scanner sc=new Scanner(System.in);
		//double tempfarenheit = sc.nextDouble();   //华氏度
        /********** Begin *********/
		//计算摄氏度
        //static float x = sc.nextFloat();
        /*if(tempfarenheit == 85) {
        	System.out.print("If the Farenheit is 85.0,the Centigrade is 29.44");
        }else System.out.print("If the Farenheit is 67.8,the Centigrade is 19.89");
   }*/
        
        //利用DecimalFormat保留摄氏度的两位小数并输出


        /********** End *********/
        
        DecimalFormat df = new DecimalFormat("#.00");
        DecimalFormat df1 = new DecimalFormat("#.0");
        
        Scanner sc = new Scanner(System.in);
        double tempfarenheit = sc.nextDouble();
        System.out.print("If the Farenheit is " + df1.format(tempfarenheit) + "," + the Centigrade is " + df.format(5*(tempfarenheit-32)/9);
		
	}
